sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_066a985c4f5f3e00e0339ffd0210c770
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ExportWithRelatedListsMine</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>ExportWithRelatedListsMine</name><script><![CDATA[function ExportWithRelatedListsMine(table, sysid) {  
  var fileName = null;  
  ExportWithRelatedLists.call(this, table, sysid);  
}  
  
  
ExportWithRelatedListsMine.prototype = new ExportWithRelatedLists();  
ExportWithRelatedListsMine.prototype.constructor = ExportWithRelatedListsMine;  
  
  
ExportWithRelatedListsMine.prototype.getFileName = function() {  
     if (this.fileName != null) {  
       return this.fileName;  
     }  
     var grName = '';  
     // if (this.parent_table == 'sys_remote_update_set') {   
      var gr = new GlideRecord(this.parent_table);  
      gr.get(this.sys_id);  
  
      if (gr.name && !gr.name.isNil()) {  
      grName = '_' + gr.name;  
      }  
     // }  
  
     return (this.parent_table + grName + '_' + this.sys_id + '.xml');  
};  
  
ExportWithRelatedListsMine.prototype.setFileName = function(fileName) {  
     this.fileName =  fileName; 
};  ]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>justin.ciemiewicz</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-06-07 16:01:39</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>066a985c4f5f3e00e0339ffd0210c770</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ExportWithRelatedListsMine</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_066a985c4f5f3e00e0339ffd0210c770</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>justin.ciemiewicz</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-06-07 16:01:39</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_processor_327a5c5c4f5f3e00e0339ffd0210c7e0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_processor"><sys_processor action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><class_name/><description>Bulk export of UDATE SETS</description><interactive>false</interactive><name>ExportAsRemoteUpdateSet</name><parameters/><params_endpoint/><path>export_as_remote_update_set</path><path_endpoint/><require_csrf>false</require_csrf><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function process(g_request, g_response, g_processor) {

	var sysidLocal = g_request.getParameter('sysparam_sys_id');
	var fileName = g_request.getParameter('sysparam_file_name');
	var source_table = g_request.getParameter('sysparam_table');

	if( source_table == 'sys_update_set' ) {

		var grUpdateSet = new GlideRecord('sys_update_set');
		
		if (grUpdateSet.get(sysidLocal)) {
			
			var grRetrievedUpdateSet = new GlideRecord('sys_remote_update_set');
				grRetrievedUpdateSet.initialize();
				grRetrievedUpdateSet.description = grUpdateSet.description;
				grRetrievedUpdateSet.name = grUpdateSet.name;
				grRetrievedUpdateSet.release_date = grUpdateSet.release_date;
				grRetrievedUpdateSet.remote_sys_id = grUpdateSet.sys_id;
				grRetrievedUpdateSet.application = grUpdateSet.application;
				grRetrievedUpdateSet.state = "loaded";
			
			if( !fileName || fileName == '' ) {
				fileName = grUpdateSet.getValue('name')+'.xml';
			}

			var grScope = new GlideRecord('sys_scope');
				grScope.get(grUpdateSet.application);
			
			if (grScope.isValid()) {
				grRetrievedUpdateSet.application_name = grScope.name;
				grRetrievedUpdateSet.application_scope = grScope.scope;
				grRetrievedUpdateSet.application_version = grScope.version;
			}

			var sysidRetrieved;

			if (sysidRetrieved = grRetrievedUpdateSet.insert()) {

				var grUpdateXML = new GlideRecord('sys_update_xml');
				grUpdateXML.addQuery('update_set', sysidLocal);
				grUpdateXML.query();

				while(grUpdateXML.next()) {
					grUpdateXML.remote_update_set = sysidRetrieved;
					grUpdateXML.update_set = '';
					grUpdateXML.insert();
				}

				var exporter = new ExportWithRelatedListsMine('sys_remote_update_set', sysidRetrieved);
				if (fileName) {
					exporter.setFileName(fileName);
				}
				exporter.addRelatedList('sys_update_xml', 'remote_update_set');
				exporter.exportRecords(g_response);

				grUpdateXML = new GlideRecord('sys_update_xml');
				grUpdateXML.addQuery('remote_update_set', sysidRetrieved);
				grUpdateXML.query();
				grUpdateXML.deleteMultiple();
				grRetrievedUpdateSet = new GlideRecord('sys_remote_update_set');
				grRetrievedUpdateSet.get(sysidRetrieved);
				grRetrievedUpdateSet.deleteRecord();
			}
		}
	}

	else if( source_table == 'sys_remote_update_set' ) {

		if( !fileName || fileName == ''  ) {
			var retrSet = new GlideRecord('sys_remote_update_set');
			if( retrSet.get( sysidLocal) ) {
				fileName = retrSet.getValue('name')+'.xml';
			}
		}

		var exporter = new ExportWithRelatedListsMine('sys_remote_update_set', sysidLocal );
		if (fileName) {
			exporter.setFileName(fileName);
		}
		exporter.addRelatedList('sys_update_xml', 'remote_update_set');
		exporter.exportRecords(g_response);
	}

})(g_request, g_response, g_processor);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_processor</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jdsiegri</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-06-07 16:01:56</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>327a5c5c4f5f3e00e0339ffd0210c7e0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ExportAsRemoteUpdateSet</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_processor_327a5c5c4f5f3e00e0339ffd0210c7e0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>justin.ciemiewicz</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-06-07 19:28:35</sys_updated_on><type>script</type></sys_processor></record_update>
